dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication
dependencies.name: py-filelock

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Plugin and hook calling mechanisms for python.
dependencies.name: py-pluggy

dependencies.description: Library with cross-python path, ini-parsing, io, code, log facilities
dependencies.name: py-py

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git
dependencies.name: py-toml

dependencies.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependencies.name: py-virtualenv

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.
name: py-tox

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
